## Classes

### gpg_keys_mgmt

This Class is the core of the module

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `gpg_keys_mgmt` class.

##### `pkg_name`

Data type: `String`

Define the package managed by the module

Default value: gnupg2

##### `pkg_ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present','absent','purged','held','installed','latest']`

Define the status of the package

Default value: installed

##### `gpg_keys`

Data type: `Optional[array]`

Type to manage the related gpg key

Default value: `undef`

##### `tmp_dir`

Data type: `String`

Temporary folder to manage the keys

Default value: '/tmp'

### gpg_keys_mgmt::install

All variables are managed from the Class gpg_key_mgmt

## Defined types

### gpg_keys_mgmt::gpg_key

@summary: Define the GPG key based on the gpg_key Type

Define the GPG key

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `gpg_keys_mgmt::gpg_key` defined type.

##### `gpgdir`

Data type: `String`

PATH where to store the GPG key

##### `ensure`

Data type: `Enum['absent','present']`

Status of the GPG key

Default value: present

##### `keyname`

Data type: `String`

Name of the GPG key

Default value: $title

##### `trustdb`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Name of the trustdb file

Default value: 'trustdb.gpg'

##### `key_type`

Data type: `Optional[Enum['public','secure']]`

Type of GPG key

Default value: 'public'

##### `trust_level`

Data type: `Optional[Enum['unknown','undefined','never','marginal','full','ultimate']]`

Level of trust of the GPG public key

Default value: 'ultimate'

##### `key_data`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

GPG armored key value

Default value: `undef`

## Resource types

### gpg_key

GPG Key type

#### Properties

The following properties are available in the `gpg_key` type.

##### `ensure`

Valid values: present, absent

The basic property that the resource should be in.

Default value: present

##### `gpgdir`

PATH of the GPG key

##### `trustdb`

Define the name of the trust DB (default trustdb.gpg)

Default value: trustdb.gpg

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `gpg_key` type.

##### `title`

GPG Key Name

##### `key_type`

Valid values: public, secure

Type of your Key.

Default value: public

##### `trust_level`

Valid values: unknown, undefined, never, marginal, full, ultimate

Level of trust of your Key.

Default value: ultimate

##### `key_data`

Valid values: %r{.+}

Content of the Key

## Tasks

### key_generator

Generate a private GPG key

**Supports noop?** false

#### Parameters

##### `gpg_name`

Data type: `String`

Name of your GPG key

##### `gpg_path`

Data type: `String`

Full PATH where to store your key (excluding .gnupg folder)

##### `gpg_type`

Data type: `Optional[Enum['rsa', 'dsa']]`

Type of your GPG key (Default: rsa)

##### `gpg_length`

Data type: `Optional[Enum['1024', '2048', '3072', 4096']]`

Length of your GPG key (Default: 2048)

##### `gpg_comment`

Data type: `Optional[String[1]]`

Comment for your GPG key

##### `gpg_email`

Data type: `Optional[String[1]]`

Email attached to your GPG key

##### `gpg_expire`

Data type: `Optional[String[1]]`

Expiration in days, (w)eeks, (m)onths, (y)ears - Examples: 5w for 5 weeks | 12 for 12 days (Default: 0 - never expire)

##### `gpg_passphrase`

Data type: `Optional[String[1]]`

Passphrase of your GPG key (Default: empty)

##### `owner`

Data type: `String`

Owner of your GPG key

##### `tmpdir`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

PATH to store temporary files (Default: /tmp)
